attributes.action: Allow soldiers to have their own month
attributes.background: As people are fighting over LGBT month and saying their should be a month for soldiers, i decided to create this petition so the people of the UK want what they want

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. The Government doesn't usually designate months to specific causes. This is usually done by campaign groups,  international organisations or it becomes a matter of tradition.
